plot: Outdoor adventure series featuring exotic destinations from around the world. Skiing, Hiking, Fishing, Scuba, White Water Rafting, Mountain climbing and a whole lot more. Hosted by Joni Ravenna.
plot_en: Outdoor adventure series featuring exotic destinations from around the world. Skiing, Hiking, Fishing, Scuba, White Water Rafting, Mountain climbing and a whole lot more. Hosted by Joni Ravenna.

title: Great Sports Vacations
